channel.title: Legato Bluetooth App
channel.description:
I want to write the bluetooth legato app for init, scan and connect for the target FX30(WP76xx).
For init i got one legato application of BluetoothUtil from [https://github.com/mangOH/Demos](https://github.com/mangOH/Demos ) for mangOH board. i tried the same for WP76xx. Can Somebody help me for some reference to write the app?

item.title: Legato Bluetooth App
